name: AI cherry_ai Dev
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y curl && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && chmod +x ./.devcontainer/setup_env.sh && echo 'Dev container creation complete. Dependencies installed and setup script made executable.'
postStartCommand:
bash ./.devcontainer/setup_env.sh && source /tmp/devcontainer_exports.sh && echo '
# Load Devcontainer Environment Variables
source /tmp/devcontainer_exports.sh' >> ~/.bashrc && echo '
# Load Devcontainer Environment Variables
source /tmp/devcontainer_exports.sh' >> ~/.bash_profile && echo 'Secrets sourced and environment configured. Check /tmp/devcontainer_exports.sh for details.'
